i hope you did not pay much because it is not a quality blade.
take the juiche of a lemmon and wipe it over the cuttingedge until you see
a hamon normally it is there in these kind of blades.
after that clean the blade and when you are lucky you wil see the hamon
still.

christophe siliacus
